name: Plasmarena
description:
Plasmarena is a graphically abstract top down arena shooter where you can blast your friends to pieces without rhyme or reason for as long as you like! In an arena setting with 2-5 players, you will all be pitted against one another in a battle to the digital death, and then you will do it again, and again, etc. Connect with your friends via LAN or through Steam and let the destruction commence!

- Up to 5 players via steam or LAN connections
- Endless fast-paced bullet-hell arena combat
- Colorful visuals
